cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shunin

sentence.kanji: 彼女は会計主任です。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kaikei shunin desu
sentence.english: She is an account manager.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tannin

sentence.kanji: 私は3年生のクラスを担任しています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha 3 nensei no kurasu wo tannin shite imasu
sentence.english: I'm in charge of the third-grade class.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ninzuu

sentence.kanji: 参加者の人数を教えてください。
sentence.romaji: sankasha no ninzuu wo oshiete kudasai
sentence.english: Please tell me the number of participants.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kizu

sentence.kanji: 足の傷が痛みます。
sentence.romaji: ashi no kizu ga itamimasu
sentence.english: The wound in my foot hurts.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fushou

sentence.kanji: その事故で多くの人が負傷したの。
sentence.romaji: sono jiko de ooku no hito ga fushou shita no
sentence.english: A lot of people were injured in the accident.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jinkou

sentence.kanji: これは人工の湖です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha jinkou no mizuumi desu
sentence.english: This is an artificial lake.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kawari

sentence.kanji: ごま油の代わりにオリーブ油を使いましょう。
sentence.romaji: gomaabura no kawari ni ori-buyu wo tsukaimashou
sentence.english: Let's use olive oil instead of sesame.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's eikyuu

sentence.kanji: 彼は永久に帰らぬ人となったのよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha eikyuu ni kaeranu hito to nata no yo
sentence.english: He passed away.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's naizou

sentence.kanji: 来週、内臓を検査します。
sentence.romaji: raishuu naizou wo kensa shimasu
sentence.english: Next week I'll have an internal medical examination.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinai

sentence.kanji: 明日は市内を観光する予定です。
sentence.romaji: ashita ha shinai wo kankou suru yotei desu 。
sentence.english: I am scheduled to go sightseeing in the city tomorrow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nanzen

sentence.kanji: 新聞社に何千ものメールが寄せられたよ。
sentence.romaji: shinbunsha ni nanzen mo no me-ru ga yoserareta yo
sentence.english: The newspaper company received thousands of e-mails.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kodai

sentence.kanji: 古代の歴史について勉強しました。
sentence.romaji: kodai no rekishi ni tsuite benkyou shimashita
sentence.english: I studied ancient history.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kurai

sentence.kanji: 位が上がれば責任も増えるものだ。
sentence.romaji: kurai ga agare ba sekinin mo fueru mono da
sentence.english: As you rise up the ranks, responsibility increases too.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chii

sentence.kanji: 彼女は会社で高い地位に就いているよ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kaisha de takai chii ni tsuite iru yo
sentence.english: She holds a high position in the company.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teiden

sentence.kanji: 台風で停電したよ。
sentence.romaji: taifuu de teiden shita yo
sentence.english: There was a blackout because of the typhoon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hyakaten

sentence.kanji: 友達と百貨店で買い物をしました。
sentence.romaji: tomodachi to hyakaten de kaimono wo shimashita
sentence.english: I went shopping at the department store with my friend.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taisou

sentence.kanji: 兄は体操の選手です。
sentence.romaji: ani ha taisou no senshu desu
sentence.english: My big brother's a gymnast.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shouka

sentence.kanji: 彼は消化不良を起こしたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shouka furyou wo okoshita n da
sentence.english: He had indigestion.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gaika

sentence.kanji: 外貨を両替しました。
sentence.romaji: gaika wo ryougae shimashita
sentence.english: I exchanged some foreign currency.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's omoitsuku

sentence.kanji: 彼は名案を思い付いたの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha meian wo omoitsuita no
sentence.english: He hit on a good idea.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kizutsukeru

sentence.kanji: あなたを傷付けるつもりはありませんでした。
sentence.romaji: anata wo kizutsukeru tsumori ha arimasendeshita
sentence.english: I didn't intend to hurt you.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukiai

sentence.kanji: 今日は付き合いで帰りが遅くなります。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha tsukiai de kaeri ga osoku narimasu
sentence.english: I'm coming home late today so I can socialize with my colleagues.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukekuwaeru

sentence.kanji: 自分の考えを付け加えました。
sentence.romaji: jibun no kangae wo tsukekuwaemashita
sentence.english: I added my own idea.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukiau

sentence.kanji: 彼女と4年ほど付き合っています。
sentence.romaji: kanojo to 4 nen hodo tsukiate imasu
sentence.english: I've been seeing her for 4 years now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hizuke

sentence.kanji: 今日の日付けは6月19日です。
sentence.romaji: kyou no hizuke ha 6 gatsu 19 nichi desu
sentence.english: Today's date is June 19th.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's juni

sentence.kanji: 今年は去年よりも順位が上がりました。
sentence.romaji: kotoshi ha kyonen yori mo juni ga agarimashita
sentence.english: Our rank went up this year more than it did last year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nanjuu

sentence.kanji: その店に何十人も行列していたよ。
sentence.romaji: sono mise ni nanjuunin mo gyouretsu shite ita yo
sentence.english: Tens of people formed a line to the shop.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's reigai

sentence.kanji: 例外は認めません。
sentence.romaji: reigai ha mitomemasen
sentence.english: Exceptions are not allowed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tatoeru

sentence.kanji: 彼は彼女をバラに例えたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kanojo wo bara ni tatoeta n da
sentence.english: He compared her to a rose.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's reidai

sentence.kanji: みんなで例題を解いてみましょう。
sentence.romaji: minna de reidai wo toite mimashou
sentence.english: Let's solve the example problem together.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tatoe

sentence.kanji: 例えを上げると話が分かり易くなる。
sentence.romaji: tatoe wo ageru to hanashi ga wakari yasuku naru
sentence.english: It will be easier to understand if you give an example.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nandaka

sentence.kanji: 茶柱が立って何だか少し幸せな気分です。
sentence.romaji: chabashira ga tate nandaka sukoshi shiawase na kibun desu
sentence.english: I saw tea leaves floating upright, so now I feel happy somehow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bai

sentence.kanji: 以前の収入は今の倍はあった。
sentence.romaji: izen no shuunyuu ha ima no bai ha ata
sentence.english: My previous income was twice what it is now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakuho

sentence.kanji: 優れた人材の確保は重要です。
sentence.romaji: sugureta jinzai no kakuho ha juuyou desu
sentence.english: Securing excellent talent is important.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sugureru

sentence.kanji: 彼は非常に優れた選手です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha hijouni sugureta senshu desu
sentence.english: He is an excellent athlete.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuushuu

sentence.kanji: 彼はとても優秀な生徒です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha totemo yuushuu na seito desu
sentence.english: He's a very exceptional student.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hirei

sentence.kanji: 努力と結果が比例していないの。
sentence.romaji: doryoku to keka ga hirei shite inai no
sentence.english: The effort and its result are not proportional.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nakanaori

sentence.kanji: けんかした友達と仲直りしました。
sentence.romaji: kenka shita tomodachi to nakanaori shimashita
sentence.english: I made up with the friend I had a fight with.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's naka

sentence.kanji: あなたたちは仲がいいですね。
sentence.romaji: anatatachi ha naka ga ii desu ne
sentence.english: You get on well together, don't you?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fujin

sentence.kanji: スミス夫人がいらっしゃいました。
sentence.romaji: sumisufujin ga irashaimashita
sentence.english: Mrs. Smith came.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nakoudo

sentence.kanji: あの夫婦は私たちの仲人です。
sentence.romaji: ano fuufu ha watashitachi no nakoudo desu
sentence.english: That couple is our go-between.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kawarugawaru

sentence.kanji: 皆が代わる代わる彼らを祝福したよ。
sentence.romaji: mina ga kawarugawaru karera wo shukufuku shita yo
sentence.english: Everyone congratulated them by turns.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's joyuu

sentence.kanji: 彼女はずっと女優になるのが夢でした。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha zuto joyuu ni naru no ga yume deshita
sentence.english: It has always been her dream to become an actress.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hogo

sentence.kanji: みんなで環境を保護しましょう。
sentence.romaji: minna de kankyou wo hogo shimashou
sentence.english: Let's all protect the environment.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's meishin

sentence.kanji: 村の人たちは迷信を信じています。
sentence.romaji: mura no hitotachi ha meishin wo shinjite imasu
sentence.english: The people in the village believe in superstition.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jinken

sentence.kanji: 全ての人に人権がある。
sentence.romaji: subete no hito ni jinken ga aru
sentence.english: All people have human rights.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kusabana

sentence.kanji: 草花を大切にしましょう。
sentence.romaji: kusabana wo taisetsu ni shimashou
sentence.english: Let's take good care of plants and flowers.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kizutsuku

sentence.kanji: 私は彼女の言葉に傷付きました。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kanojo no kotoba ni kizutsukimashita
sentence.english: I was hurt by her words.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kenzen

sentence.kanji: 子供の健全な心を育てましょう。
sentence.romaji: kodomo no kenzen na kokoro wo sodatemashou
sentence.english: Let's cultivate a wholesome mindset in children.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hoken

sentence.kanji: 保健室で少し休んだわ。
sentence.romaji: hokenshitsu de sukoshi yasunda wa
sentence.english: I rested a little in the school nurse's office.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tahou

sentence.kanji: 他方の視点からも見てみましょう。
sentence.romaji: tahou no shiten kara mo mite mimashou
sentence.english: Let's think from the other point of view.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's karini

sentence.kanji: 仮にそれが事実だとしてももう遅いよ。
sentence.romaji: karini sore ga jijitsu da to shite mo mou osoi yo
sentence.english: Even if it is true, it's already too late.
